metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on feeling Shar's protection fade.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the deep curse on Shadowheart while Shar's protection is active.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Even Lady Shar's blessings cannot protect me here.
0.context: NodeContext: Commenting on losing Shar's protection against a shadow curse (venturing into where its strongest)

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: The curse bites deep here... I need to get to safety.
1.context: NodeContext: Commenting on losing Shar's protection against a shadow curse (venturing into where its strongest)
